title: Part-Time Virtual Assistant – Simple Messaging Tasks (Real Estate)
job_overview:
We are a real estate investment company based in the Netherlands. We are looking for a reliable, detail-oriented virtual assistant to help with simple outreach tasks. You will be responsible for sending pre-written messages to property owners via online classified sites.

What you’ll do:
- Visit Dutch property listings (links provided or via search)
- Send a short, pre-written message to the seller (copy-paste)
- Track sent messages in a Google Sheet
- Communicate updates with us via email or WhatsApp

What we’re looking for:
- Very basic English writing/reading skills
- Attention to detail and ability to follow instructions
- Responsible, consistent and honest
- No real estate experience required

Tools we use:
- Google Sheets
- Chrome browser
- WhatsApp (for communication)

This job is simple and ideal for beginners, students, or part-time workers.
You don’t need to speak Dutch — we provide everything in templates.
